titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for the cost of installing automatic fire sprinkler systems in certain buildings.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E759)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a general business credit for the cost of installing an automatic sprinkler system in a qualified building. Allows a deduction for such unused credits.
